actions.name: Lunar Presence
actions.description:
Trigger: The user declares Lunar Dance
Effect: Connection - Lunar Dance. The creature targeted by the triggering attack gains @Affliction[boosted] 7.

actions.name: Lunar Presence
actions.description: Passive: The user's Dark- and Fairy-Type attacks deal 50% more damage, and the user benefits from Gloomy Weather.
